1254:5: tathā hi te'gnimati pradeśe dhūmasya bhūyodarśanaṃ tadviyukte ca tathaivādarśanamityanvayavyatirekitvaṃ kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ |
1254:6: nanu bhūyasāpi pravṛtte darśanādarśane ghaṭakulaṭādāvupalabdho vyabhicāra iti cet |
1254:12: tasmādagnidhūmayoravyabhicārasyāsaṃbhave śatamapi tadupapattayaḥ tatprasādhakaviśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhā vā nānumānopayoginaḥ |
1254:13: saṃbhave vā kiṃ tadutpattyā tadupayoginā viśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhena,
1254:15: tathā ca kāśikākāraḥ prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyenacarameṇa cetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ gṛhyata iti ||
1254:16: trilocanastvāha - pratyakṣānupalambhayorviśeṣaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ tābhyāṃ sāmānyayoḥ saṃbandhapratipattiḥ |
1254:31: asmākaṃ tu bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati |
1254:33: tadvyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ saṃbandhamatikrāmediti hetovipakṣaśaṅkānivartakaṃ pramāṇamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptopādhivirahaheturanupalambhākhyaṃ pratyakṣameva |
1254:36: tathā hi dhumādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ |
1254:40: vahnayādīnāṃ tu sphuṭamārdrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandho na tu svābhāvikaḥ |
1254:45: na cādṛśyamāno'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sagdihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam |
1254:47: iti tu dattāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta |
1254:57: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnenānviṣyanto'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ |
1254:58: syādetat | anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet,
1254:61: athānyasya cedanyat kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati,
1254:65: tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi |
1254:66: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva |
1254:68: kena punaḥ pramāṇenaiṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate |
1254:70: tathā hi abhijāatamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikāsaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ |
1254:71: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandheṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇānyunnetavyāni |
1254:72: svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetavaḥ svasādhyena yadi sādhyamantareṇa bhaveyuḥ,
1254:73: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāstatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeveti ||
1254:74: atrocyate | iha khalu bhede tadutpattireva vyāptiḥ |
1254:75: na cāsāvanyo vā svata evāvinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhūyodarśanamātrataḥ sidhyati |
1254:76: tathā hi, kiṃ yatra bhūyodarśanapravṛttistatra niyatatvavyavasthā,
1254:84: prathamapakṣe pratipattuḥ kimāyātaṃ yato nānumānamayaṃ kuryāt |
1254:85: anyathānyasya tadviṣayapratyakṣīkāreṇaiva so'pi kṛtārtha iti kimavaśyamanumānamanveṣate |
1254:88: śāstrakāraṃ ca pṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭasaṃbandho'pi dhṛmādagnimanumāsyata ityalaukikam |
1254:90: na hi yatra vyabhicārastatraiva tāvati kāle deśe vāvaśyaṃ pratītimavatarati |
1254:95: tadaiva krameṇa vā vyabhicāraṃ paśyediti cet |
1254:99: vyaktaṃ tasya tāvat tadapyamānamāpannamiti mahat pāṇḍityam |
1254:103: tato bahulaṃ sahacāramātreṇa na vyabhicārī na vāvyabhicārī niścita iti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ ||
1254:107: atha kadācit pratipattā pravṛtto vyabhicāraṃ paśyati |
1254:112: yadyevaṃ dvicandrādau cakṣurādipratyakṣaṃ malinapauruṣamupalabdhamiti ghaṭādikamapi nopasthāpayediti cet |
1254:117: na caivaṃ dhūmādau pārthivatvādau ca vyāptigrāhakasya bhūyodarśanasya lakṣaṇabhedo yenaikatrāśvāsaḥ syāt ||
1254:122: na cātra dhūmasyāgnisahacāraḥ sadātano'yamatha suhṛddvayasyeva sātyayo gṛhīta iti saṃśaye sadātanasahacāraprasādhakapramāṇāntarasaṅgatirasti,
1254:124: tarhi bādhyamānatvābādhyamānatvalakṣaṇo lakṣaṇabhedo bhaviṣyatītyapi na vaktavyam,
1254:127: pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyālābho vā paryudāsaścāsiddha iti na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ |
1254:129: niyatatvābhāve'pi pārthivatvādau bhūyodarśanasaṃbhavāditi na bhūyodarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ ||
1254:134: yadvi yatra jñāne pratibhāsate tad grāhyam |
1254:140: tataśca sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāpekṣayā rūparasagandhasparśasamudāyātmakasya ghaṭasya rūpabhedamātragrahaṇe'pi pratyakṣataḥ samudāyasiddhivyavasthā |
1254:146: na ca manasā tajjātīyānāṃ vyāptigrahaḥ śakyaḥ,
1254:149: na ca vahnivyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ āṃbandhamatikrāmediti vaktumucitam,
1254:152: yo yatropādhinā niyatastatra tasya svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ |
1254:157: arthāntaraṃ ca kiñcid dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ ca kiñcit,
1254:167: vyabhicārasya sarvadeśakālayoḥ saṃbhave'pi dṛśyatve'pi sarvadā sarvatra sarveṇa sāmagryabhāvādapi niścetumaśakyatvāt |
1254:169: nanu yadi dhūmasyāpekṣaṇīyamarthāntaramupādhiḥ syāt kathaṃ dhūma ityeva pāvakasattāniyama iti cet |
1254:170: nanvidameva cintyate kiṃ dhūme satyavaśyamagniḥ saṃbhavīna veti |
1254:171: kadācidarthāntaramupādhimapekṣya dhūmo'pi syānnāgniriti kimatra niṣṭabdhaṃ kāraṇam |
1254:172: tasmāt pāvakaparādhīnodayo dhūmaḥ pariniṣṭhitaḥ kathaṃ tadabhāve bhāvaṃ svīkuryādityeva sādhu |
1254:173: atha vyaktau jātau vā vahnivyabhicāro na dṛṣṭaḥ,
1254:175: tat kiṃ sthāṇuvyaktau jātau vā puruṣatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena sthāṇau śaṅkayate |
1254:177: ihāpyanyatra bhūyaḥ sahacāriṇi pārthivatvādau dṛṣṭa eva vyabhicāraḥ |
1254:178: yatraiva tu yat saṃśayyate tatraiva tasya darśanamapekṣyata ityalaukikam |
1254:179: yadi dhūmavyaktau vyabhicāro dṛṣṭastadā dhūmasāmānyaṃ vyāptau bahirbhūtameva,
1254:183: ato dhūmajātāvadṛśyamāno'pi vyabhicāra upādhirvā darśanāyogyatayā niṣeddhumaśakya iti saṃśayo durvāraprasaraḥ |
1254:184: sa cedānīmupādhervyabhicārasya vā saṃśayaḥ svābhāvikatvasaṃśayasvabhāvaḥ svābhāvikatvaniścayaṃ tāvadavaśyaṃ pratibadhnāti |
1254:190: yathā dahano nendhanena vinā dhūmena saṃbadhyate tathā dhūmo'pi na tena vināgninā saṃbadhyata iti samānamupādhitvamindhanasyobhayatra |
1254:192: asiddhasya tu dhūmasya tannimittātmalābhatayāvyabhicārāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti vyavasthā pyata iti cet |
1254:198: yasya tu sakṛttadutpattipratītireva sarvatrāvyabhicārapratītistasya nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ |
1254:201: bhūya ityapariniṣṭhitavārasaṃkhyatvāt kiyatā darśanena lakṣaṇānusārī nirvṛtimāsādayet |
1254:208: na hi dṛśyamāno ghaṭaḥ kalpita ucyate |
1254:209: na ca sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam,
1254:213: pramāṇaviṣaye'pi śaṅkā kartuṃ śakyata iti cet |
1254:215: svīkṛtapramāṇasya hi niścayaphalatvāt pramāṇasyāvipratipannapramāṇaviṣaye niścayasvīkāranāntarīyaka eva tatsvīkāraḥ |
1254:223: kiṃ ca bādhakādarśane'pi sādhakabhāvādapi śaṅkā syādeva |
1254:228: yatra tadutpattisāmagrīṃ hṛdayena dūrīkṛtyānyataḥ sahacaritadvayād viśeṣaṃṇa pratītau pratyupāya eva devīyān |
1254:231: kena punaḥ pramāṇena eṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyata ityādistadgrahaṇaprakāraḥ pūrvameva nirākṛtaḥ |
1254:232: tathā svābhāvikatvāsiddhau svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetava ityādyupasaṃhāropi manorājyamātram |
1254:234: tadevaṃ svābhāvikavādena hṛdayānulepanamaśucineva parihāryaṃ dūrata iti |
